mapper.sql: select id, fzxid, flow_name, type_flag, remark, status, createdate, creator, modifydate, modifier from md_workflow
mapper.select:
SELECT wf.id, wf.fzxid, sb.fzx, wf.flow_name, wf.type_flag, wft.type_name, wf.remark, wf.status, wf.createdate, wf.creator, wf.modifydate, wf.modifier FROM md_workflow wf LEFT JOIN sys_branch sb ON wf.fzxid = sb.branch_id LEFT JOIN md_workflow_type wft ON wf.type_flag = wft.type_flag
wf.id = #{id}
